mapper.select: select id, section, practice_type, base_course_id from base_courses_course_practice where status = 'ACTIVE' and base_course_id = #{base_course_id} order by section, practice_type
mapper.insert: insert into base_courses_course_practice( created, modified, status, section, practice_type, base_course_id ) values ( now(), now(), #{status}, #{section}, #{practice_type}, #{base_course_id} )
